ERROR:
Ran into 'ascii' codec can't encode character '\xe9' in position 2297: ordinal not in range(128) while trying to write to /workspace/benchmark/datasets/2-HITs/HierarchyTransformers/src/hierarchy_transformers/losses/hit_loss.py

extras.old_content: ### TODO: compute and combine hyperbolic clustering and centripetal losses here
extras.new_content:
# Compute hyperbolic clustering loss (triplet loss in Poincaré ball)
        cluster_loss_fn = HyperbolicClusteringLoss(self.manifold, self.cluster_loss_margin)
        cluster_loss = cluster_loss_fn(rep_anchor, rep_positive, rep_negative)

        # Compute hyperbolic centripetal loss (norm-based loss)
        centri_loss_fn = HyperbolicCentripetalLoss(self.manifold, self.centri_loss_margin)
        centri_loss = centri_loss_fn(rep_anchor, rep_positive, rep_negative)

        # Combine losses with weights
        combined_loss = self.cluster_weight * cluster_loss + self.centri_weight * centri_loss
